name: Godot Media
overview:
(Godot Media - www.godotmedia.com) is a professional writing services company offering a wide range of quality and cost effective content services. Godot writers have expertise in a number of domains and have excellent research skills to produce quality content for a wide range of requirements. They serve clients from diverse backgrounds, including lifestyle, business, technology, SEO, internet marketing, finance, travel, medical and health. Their services include:

  • SEO/ Web Copywriting
  • SEO Article Writing
  • Social Media Service/ Writing/ Buzz Creation
  • Blog Writing
  • Web Content Writing
  • eBook Writing
  • Travel Writing
  • Academic writing
  • Business Writing/Communication

And more..
